result.content:
• Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)

Import
Fitnesse

HuntTheWumpusContext

GenerateMapContext


Test: Bats In Cavern
variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim
classpath: ./WumpusGame/bin
Input Map:
script Generate Map
make Empty1 map N
make Pit map E
make Arrow map S
make Bats map S
make Empty3 map W
make Wumpus map W
make Empty4 map N
make Bats map N

Testing user teleportation funtion when user meets bats.

Test when bats take user to an empty cavern:
script Bat Test
set 0 bat -1 
__EXCEPTION__:java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem: 
	The constructor Bat(Map.Cavern) is undefined

	at Fitnesse.BatTest.setBat(BatTest.java:26) [file:/Users/Paimon/Downloads/FitNesseRoot/WumpusGame/bin/]

go w from -1 at 0
check event You have encountered bats! You are being flown to another location...
check player in 0 at -1 [false] expected [true]
